Package org.catlady.client.controller

Class UpdateController

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.client.controller.UpdateController
public class UpdateController extends Object
Methods to perform actions on the GUI.

    Create the controller with access to the GUI.

  • Constructor Details

    • UpdateController

      public UpdateController(GUI gui)
      Create the controller with access to the GUI. Send the result of the request to GUI.
      Parameters:
      gui - the game GUI.

  • Method Details

    • showErrorMessage

      public void showErrorMessage(String message)
      Display a popup error message
      Parameters:
      message - the error message to display

    • addLobby

      public void addLobby(String message)
      Add a new lobby to the displayed ones. Called as result of a request for public lobbies.
      Parameters:
      message - the lobby name and the number of players

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(String message)
      Add a message in chat.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display.

    • sendChatMessage

      public void sendChatMessage(ChatMessage message)
      Add a message in chat.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display composed of sender and body.

    • getInLobby

      public void getInLobby()
      Enter the lobby you entered in.

    • leaveLobby

      public void leaveLobby()
      Leave the lobby you are in.

    • canGameStart

      public void canGameStart()
      Enable or disable the can start game button inside the lobby, result of other player entering or exiting the lobby.

    • startGame

      public void startGame(int numberOfPlayers)
      Start game.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - the number of player that are in game, defined by the number of players in lobby at the moment of a game start.

    • updateGameState

      public void updateGameState(ClientGameManager gameManager, List<String> playerOrder)
      Update the game panles graphic with the current game state
      Parameters:
      gameManager - the state of the game.
      playerOrder - the order of the players from the prospective of the current player.

    • enterEndGame

      public void enterEndGame(List<CatCard> playerCats)
      Start the end game giving the GUI the cats to feed.
      Parameters:
      playerCats - the cats of the current player.

    • showLeaderboard

      public void showLeaderboard(Map<String,PointCategory> leaderBoard)
      Show the final leaderboard with the scores of every player.
      Parameters:
      leaderBoard - the scores of the players.
